SongName: I Know What You Did Last Summer
Album: I Know What You Did Last Summer
Lyric:
[by:LEFTWords]
[00:02.49]I, hey, I, I
[00:10.52]I, hey, I, I
[00:16.93]He knows dirty secrets that I keep
[00:20.74]Does he know it's killing me?
[00:22.98]He knows, he knows
[00:24.87]D-d-does he know another's hands have touched my skin?
[00:29.14]I won't tell him where I've been
[00:31.44]He knows, he knows
[00:33.46]He knows
[00:35.17]It's tearing me apart
[00:37.01]And she's slipping away (I'm slipping away)
[00:39.12]Am I just hanging on to all the words she used to say?
[00:43.24]The pictures on her phone
[00:45.37]And she's not coming home (I'm not coming home)
[00:47.31]Coming home, coming home
[00:51.02]I know what you did last summer
[00:53.19]Just lie to me, there is no other
[00:55.20]I know what you did last summer
[00:57.16]Tell me where you've been
[00:59.53]I know what you did last summer
[01:01.44]Look me in the eyes, my lover

[01:09.64]I know, I know, I know

[01:14.14]I know, I know, I know
[01:16.63]I didn't mean it, no
[01:18.08]I didn't mean it, mean it, no

[01:22.65]Can't seem to hold you close
[01:24.47]I know when she looks me in the eyes
[01:28.24]They don't seem as bright
[01:30.60]No more, no more, I know
[01:34.55]But she loved me at one time
[01:36.59]Would I promise her that night
[01:38.72]Cross my heart and hope to die
[01:41.85]It's tearing me apart (It's tearing me apart
[01:44.89]And she's slipping away (I'm slipping away)
[01:46.59]Am I just hanging on to all the words she used to say?
[01:50.62]The pictures on her phone (The pictures on her phone)
[01:52.89]And she's not coming home (I'm not coming home)
